Core Values

We Hustle Hard & Work Hard.
"Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle."
-Abraham Lincoln
We Embrace Accountability Coachability, & Discipline.
"Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishments."
-Jim Rohn
We exude boundless positive energy, passion & enthusiasm.
"Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out."
-John Wooden
We have a growth mindset.
"Growth is the great separator between those who succeed and those who do not. When I see a person beginning to separate themselves from the pack, it's almost always due to personal growth."
-John Maxwell
We are a driven and committed team player.
"Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a civilization work."
-Vince Lombardi
We have character & integrity.
"Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity."
-W. Clement Stone

The Key to Life by Design, Not By Default
It's not what you make, It's what you Keep.




Value Proposition

DFT Value Proposition and What This Means for You

We have the organized processes, systems, scripts, experience, and leadership that will allow you to focus on the 20% of activities that make you money, rather than on the 80% of activities that don't. By being on our team, you will earn more money and have the greater freedom than you would working on your own.
